Quincy.Hardwick House (Quincy, Massachusetts): The Hardwick House is a historic house at 59–61 Spear Street in Quincy, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story wood-frame house was built in 1850s, and is one of the city's largest Greek Revival houses. Its massing, with side-gable roof, is more typical of the Federal period, but it has corner pilasters, a full entablature, and pedimented gables.
